name: Winter Salad
description: The perfect in-season salad â€“ orange segments brighten the plate on a cold winter's day.

ingredients.name: celery root
ingredients.additionalInstruction: peeled and julienned, or 2 celery stalks, sliced

ingredients.name: pepitas (green pumpkin seeds) or sunflower seeds

preparation: Finely grate 1 tsp peel from clementine and stir into Dressing.
Place spinach in a large serving bowl. Add clementine, mushrooms, and celery root. Drizzle with Dressing, then toss to mix. Sprinkle with pepitas and serve.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve topped with Beef Tenderloin with Pinot Noir Sauce and crusty whole-grain rolls.

products.name: Balsamic Vinaigrette Dressing Mix
summary: Fresh, bright & bold blend of Mediterranean herbs with notes of garlic & rosemary. Our most versatile dressing.
